IAS release

Package org.eso.ias.plugin.publisher

The package contains the implementation of the publisher to send data to the IAS core.
Author:
acaproni
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MonitorPointSender
    The MonitorPointSender defines the interface to send monitor point values and alarms to the IAS core.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferedMonitoredSystemData
    The data structure encapsulating monitor point values and alarm retrieved from a monitored system and to be sent to the IAS core.
    BufferedPublisherBase
    Extends PublisherBase for publishing data to the IAS core with buffering.
    MonitorPointData
    A java POJO representing a monitor point or alarm to be sent to the IAS.
    MonitorPointDataToBuffer
    A java POJO representing a monitor point or alarm to be sent to the IAS in a buffered way.
    MonitorPointSender.SenderStats
    The statistics provided by the sender in the last time interval.
    PublisherBase
    Base class for publishing data to the core of the IAS: received monitor points are queued to be sent when the time interval (PublisherBase.throttlingTime) elapses or the max allowed size of the buffer has been reached
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PublisherException
    The exception returned by the Publisher
